pos_mean_info_list.mean: 年龄；时代；寿命，使用年限；阶段
使成熟；使变老，使上年纪
歧视老年人（尤指在就业和住房方面）

bilingual.source: The aged dog lay quietly in its bed.
bilingual.target: 那只年老的狗安静地躺在它的床上。

bilingual.source: The aged man walked slowly with a cane.
bilingual.target: 那位年老的男子拄着拐杖慢慢走着。

bilingual.source: The aged woman shared stories from her youth.
bilingual.target: 那位年老的女士分享了她年轻时的故事。

bilingual.source: The aged professor still teaches at the university.
bilingual.target: 那位年老的教授仍然在大学教书。

bilingual.source: The aged tree stood tall in the middle of the park.
bilingual.target: 那棵年老的树在公园中央高高耸立。

bilingual.source: She has no relations besides an aged aunt.
bilingual.target: 她除了有一个年老的伯母以外,再没有亲戚了.

bilingual.source: At the agency, the aged agent is urgently urged to go for surgery by the gentle surgeon.
bilingual.target: 在办事处,温和的外科医生急切地催促年老的代理商做外科手术。

bilingual.source: We need some volunteers aged 12-16 to help us.
bilingual.target: 我们需要一些12-16岁的志愿者来帮助我们。

bilingual.source: His beard turned gray as he aged.
bilingual.target: 随着年龄增长，他的胡子变白了。

bilingual.source: He is a potbellied middle-aged man.
bilingual.target: 他是一个大腹便便的中年男人。

yingyinNormal.en: Easily calculable. We begin by identifying a set of married couples with unisex names. We then eliminate those unqualified for restaurant work, the aged, the imprisoned and the limbless, for example, next we look at...
yingyinNormal.zh: 很好算嘛。先找到几对双方都取中性名字的已婚夫妇，然后剔除那些不适合从事餐饮工作的，比如说年老的，坐牢的，残疾的，再然后就……

yingyinNormal.en: Now his shortcomings are he's another middle-aged white guy, underwhelming, unimaginative and a long-time friend of the NRA.
yingyinNormal.zh: 缺点是，也是个中年白人，平庸无趣，而且是全国步枪协会的老朋友。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, Newton discovered binomial theorem aged 22. Einstein wrote four papers that changed the world by the age of 26. As far as I can tell, I've barely made par.
yingyinNormal.zh: 牛顿在二十二岁就发现了二项式定理，爱因斯坦二十六岁前就撰写了四篇改变世界的论文，据我所知，我还远远不能匹及。

yingyinNormal.en: And then this, this is a Chinkiang black rice vinegar and it's been fermented and aged, it's delicious, it imparts a sort of smokiness. And it's going to give it a little bit of sour.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有这个，镇江香醋，陈年酿造，味道鲜美，带有烟熏风味，能让豆腐带点酸味。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. … 岁的；…年 纪的；古老的；老的；老化的；超过成熟年龄的

word_family.mean: n. 年龄；年代；时代；老年；晚年；人生的特定阶段；代；一生；一（时）代；很长时间

examination_example.sentence: They found that middle-<highlight>aged</highlight> people with higher measures of abdominal fat scored worse on measures of fluid intelligence as the years went by.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们发现，随着时间的推移，腹部脂肪含量较高的中年人在流体智力测试中得分更低。

examination_example.sentence: The researchers looked at data that included measurements of lean muscle and abdominal fat from more than 4,000 middle-to-older-<highlight>aged</highlight> men and women.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员查看了4000多名中老年男性和女性“肌肉”和“腹部脂肪”的测量数据。

examination_example.sentence: The explanation for rising rates of mortality, mental-health problems, and addiction among poorly-educated, middle-<highlight>aged</highlight> people is a shortage of well-paid jobs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在受教育程度低的中年人中，死亡、心理健康问题和染上毒瘾的比例不断增长的原因是缺少高薪工作。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

examination_example.sentence: Children <highlight>aged</highlight> four are often more curious than older children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 四岁的孩子往往比大一点的孩子更好奇。

examination_example.sentence: Children <highlight>aged</highlight> one to four were the most likely to need help from doctors for a foreign object in their nose.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1到4岁的儿童最可能因为鼻子里有异物而需要医生的帮助。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. … 岁的；…年 纪的；古老的；老的；老化的；超过成熟年龄的

word_family.mean: n. 年龄；年代；时代；老年；晚年；人生的特定阶段；代；一生；一（时）代；很长时间

examination_example.sentence: Both adults and youngsters <highlight>aged</highlight> 13+ are required to deliver our newspaper.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 13岁以上的成年人和青少年都需要为我们送报。

examination_example.sentence: A couple of years ago, film-maker David Bond realised that his children, then <highlight>aged</highlight> five and three, were attached to screens.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几年前，电影制作人大卫·邦德意识到他当时五岁和三岁的孩子都被屏幕所吸引。

examination_example.sentence: Police officers at three German airports looked for families with school-<highlight>aged</highlight> children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 德国三个机场的警察寻找有学龄儿童的家庭。

examination_example.sentence: Fishing is one of the most popular activities among the middle-<highlight>aged</highlight> people.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 钓鱼是中年人最喜爱的活动之一。
